tool_description: This is an API to get the Longitude and Latitude Information based on an IP address.

api_list.name: ip-city
api_list.description: Get the details of Longitude and Latitude based on an IP address.

required_parameters.name: ip
required_parameters.description: The IP address of the country you want to query.

required_parameters.name: key
required_parameters.description: API Key generated by Infodb.com for authentication.
